name: South State Bank
description: South State Bank is a regional financial institution headquartered in Columbia, South Carolina, dedicated to providing a full suite of banking and financial services to individuals, businesses, and communities. Founded in 1934, South State has a rich history of growth and service, establishing itself as a trusted partner in the Southeastern United States. The bank offers a wide range of services, including personal banking, business banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management. With a customer-centric approach, South State Bank emphasizes building long-term relationships and delivering tailored financial solutions to meet diverse customer needs. The bank is committed to community development, actively participating in local initiatives and supporting economic growth in the areas it serves. As it continues to expand its footprint, South State Bank leverages technology to enhance customer experience while maintaining a strong focus on personalized service. The bank's mission is to enhance the financial well-being of its customers and communities through integrity, innovation, and excellence in service.
